MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived onsite and in order to complete a repair on our underground cable network on Menzies Road, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:07pm on Friday, 25 December 2020
